articles.title: Clot-busters to tackle coronavirus patients' blood problems - The Times
articles.description: The NHS has ordered thousands of hi-tech clot-busting devices to treat seriously ill coronavirus patients as it emerged that almost a third are developing dangerous blood clots.The Geko devices, which

articles.author: By Eve Simmons For The Mail On Sunday
articles.title: Would you pay £300 for the test that tells if you've already had the coronavirus? - Daily Mail
articles.description: Miranda Levy, 52, from Chigwell, Essex, paid £300 for a private test which showed she had not been infected with Covid-19 she suspected she had contracted while in New York in January.
articles.content: It's a niggling question eating away at millions of Britons: was that wretched cough that lasted for most of February actually coronavirus? And if it was, might you have locked down your life for nothing? The answer lies in a simple test that looks for antibo… [+11962 chars]
